messages.content: So here we are then, at last we have the chance to decide; 5 more years of Gordon Brown and Labour or the vital change that the country so badly needs with the Conservatives? There really is no other viable alternative. A vote for anybody other than David Cameron is as good as a vote to keep Gordon Brown in power. Even if you only lend us your vote this time, please do so to change our country. If elected, we will bring change to Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce our nation's budget deficit and keep interest rates and mortgages low, thus implying a conservative approach to fiscal policy.
The Conservative Party promises lower taxes, stating that extra tax on jobs that just about everybody in business says will cost jobs.
Create job opportunities by boosting enterprise and abolishing the 'job tax' on the first 10 new jobs created by businesses.
Work to get immigration back down into the tens of thousands a year as it was in the 1990s, not the hundreds of thousands it is now.
Change the law so that a referendum will be required before any more powers, including adoption of the Euro, can be transferred to Europe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberals say we can't win in Yardley. Since 1918, we've won it 11 times and they've won once!

issues.brexitEurope: Change the law so that a referendum will be required before any more powers, including adoption of the Euro, can be transferred to Europe.
issues.economy: Reduce our nation's budget deficit and keep interest rates and mortgages low.
issues.governance: Change the law so that a referendum will be required before any more powers, including adoption of the Euro, can be transferred to Europe. The Liberal Democrats want to adopt the Euro and give a European Government – ironically they also want to increase the cost of cheap holiday flights to Europe with a new plane tax.
issues.immigration: Work to get immigration back down into the tens of thousands a year as it was in the 1990s, not the hundreds of thousands it is now.
